alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:40PM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Rothschild affecting Marathon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River below Alexander Reservoir affecting Lincoln County. Wisconsin River below Biron Reservoir affecting Wood County. Wisconsin River below Whiting Dam affecting Portage County. Wisconsin River below Stevens Point affecting Portage County. Wisconsin River at Merrill affecting Lincoln and Marathon Counties. Wisconsin River below Wausau affecting Marathon County. For the Wisconsin River...including Alexander Reservoir, Wausau, Rothschild, Whiting Dam, Stevens Point, Biron Reservoir...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wisconsin River below Alexander Reservoir. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1261.0 feet, Water may approach structures adjacent to the river. Flooding is occurring in Ott Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:10 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 1260.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:10 PM CDT Thursday was 1260.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1259.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
